thread.title: Caitlyn Jenner Calls Trump's Roll Backs on Transgender Rights a "Disaster"
thread.title_full: Caitlyn Jenner Calls Trump's Roll Backs on Transgender Rights a "Disaster"

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Caitlyn Jenner Calls Trump's Roll Backs on Transgender Rights a "Disaster"
text:
One of President Donald Trump's biggest celebrity supporters is finally speaking out against him.
Well @realDonaldTrump , from one Republican to another, this is a disaster. You made a promise to protect the LGBTQ community. Call me. pic.twitter.com/XwYe0LNUOq
‚Äî Caitlyn Jenner (@Caitlyn_Jenner) February 24, 2017 After it was announced on Wednesday evening that the Trump administration was rolling back Obama-era federal protections for transgender students , Caitlyn Jenner took to Twitter with a video message for the trans community as well as for Trump himself.
"I have a message for the trans kids of America: You're winning," she began. "I know it doesn't feel like it today or every day, but you're winning. Very soon, we will win full freedom nationwide and it's going to be with bipartisan support. You can help by checking out the National Center for Transgender Equality, and letting Washington hear you loud and clear."
Link to @TransEquality to tell Washington how we feel: https://t.co/L272I22dN6
‚Äî Caitlyn Jenner (@Caitlyn_Jenner) February 24, 2017 The reality star and Olympic gold medalist then pivoted to who she called "the bullies," taking aim in particular at Attorney General Jeff Sessions. She also voiced her support for Gavin Grimm, the 17-year-old transgender high school student who is the lead plaintiff in an upcoming Supreme Court case against his school board which, according to the New York Times , could help legally settle the right for transgender people to use the bathroom of their choice and "could greatly expand transgender rights ‚Äî or roll them back."
 "Now I have a message for the bullies: You're sick," Jenner said. "And because you're weak, you pick on kids, you pick on women, or anyone else you think is vulnerable. Apparently, even becoming the attorney general isn't enough to cure some people of their insecurities. As proof, the Supreme Court will soon hear a very important Title IX case thanks to the courage of a very brave young man, Gavin Grimm. Mr. President, we'll see you in court."
Jenner then concluded her video by addressing Trump directly.
"Finally, I have a message for President Trump ‚Äî from, well, one Republican to another," she said. "This is a disaster, and you can still fix it. You made a promise to protect the LGBTQ community. Call me."
Jenner's message in the video echoes what she's said in the past about her hopes to help Republicans better understand LGBTQ rights from within the party ‚Äî but as many were quick to state in response to her video, the message was too little, too late.
@Caitlyn_Jenner BISH PLEASE. You know we all warned you. You can't vote for a fascist and eat your cake too. #protecttranskids
‚Äî Kristina Wong ‚ùÑÔ∏è (@mskristinawong) February 24, 2017 @realDonaldTrump *picks staunch anti-LGBT VP*
*enacts anti-LGBT legislation* @Caitlyn_Jenner : pic.twitter.com/rJhu5HuN2u
‚Äî Erick Fernandez (@ErickFernandez) February 24, 2017 @Caitlyn_Jenner @realDonaldTrump if only there was some way to have predicted this
‚Äî elan gale (@theyearofelan) February 24, 2017 @Caitlyn_Jenner Listen! Don't try to stand up now. This man has been a vile demon from day 1 & you stood in support like a pure FOOL! Bye! pic.twitter.com/ay0BaxKuiG
‚Äî ‚ú≠Bending Reality‚ú≠ (@BlkCarmenSDiego) February 24, 2017
@Caitlyn_Jenner @realDonaldTrump You voted for him. He'll call you because he loves the attention, but he won't do shit! #YouSowedThis
‚Äî Perez (@ThePerezHilton) February 24, 2017 @Caitlyn_Jenner just because we're talking about trans kids now you express your opinion? What about all those immigrants treated badly?
‚Äî JACOPO üç¶ (@jacopoloda) February 24, 2017
@Caitlyn_Jenner seriously? The fact that you expected anything else is proof of your ignorance and privilege.
